meanings.definition: A colloquial term for a crayfish.
meanings.sent1: I caught a crawdaddy by the creek.
meanings.sent2: The crawdaddy scuttled along the riverbed.
meanings.sent3: Why did the crawdaddy bring a tiny suitcase to the crayfish party?
meanings.sent4: The crawdaddy, a miniature lobster of the stream, ruled the underwater kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The children squealed with delight as they observed the colorful crawdaddy in the water.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for one's father.
meanings.sent1: My crawdaddy always tells the best bedtime stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time fishing with my crawdaddy.
meanings.sent3: When my crawdaddy starts dancing, everyone joins in!
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was a beacon, guiding me like a crawdaddy through the waters of life.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of my crawdaddy's embrace was like sunshine on a cold day.
